title: Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Wreath Garland Set, 23.6inch Wreath and 8.8 Feet Garland with Pines Cones, Berry Clusters, Frosted Branches, 100 LED Warm Lights for Indoor Outdoor Christmas Decorations
descriptions:
**Deck the Halls with Our Stunning Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Wreath Garland Set**

Get ready to add a touch of festive magic to your home with our exquisite Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Wreath Garland Set. This beautiful set is perfect for indoor and outdoor Christmas decorations, featuring a 23.6-inch wreath and 8.8 feet of garland adorned with snowflake pine needle branches, two types of pine cones, berry clusters, and frosted branches.

The pièce de résistance is the 100 LED warm lights that illuminate the entire set, creating a warm and cozy ambiance that's sure to impress your family and friends. The lights are battery-operated, requiring only 3 AA batteries, and feature a convenient timer function that turns them on for 6 hours and off for 18 hours.

Our Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Wreath Garland Set is made from high-quality, hypoallergenic, and fireproof materials, ensuring it's safe and durable for years to come. The best part? No assembly is required, and maintenance is minimal, so you can focus on enjoying the holiday season.

Whether you hang it on your wall, door, fireplace, or windows, this stunning wreath garland set is sure to be the centerpiece of your holiday decor. Plus, with a 365-day warranty and 24-hour customer service, you can shop with confidence.

**Key Features:**

* 23.6-inch wreath and 8.8 feet of garland
* 100 LED warm lights
* Snowflake pine needle branches, two types of pine cones, berry clusters, and frosted branches
* Battery-operated with timer function
* High-quality, hypoallergenic, and fireproof materials
* No assembly required
* Minimal maintenance
* Suitable for indoor and outdoor use
* 365-day warranty and 24-hour customer service

**Order now and get ready to make your holiday season merry and bright!**
